concept.title: Create Unbounded Hatches
concept.shortdesc: You can define a hatch boundary composed by multiple points manipulated from the Boundary option of -HATCH or -BHATCH command. System inquires for whether to retain boundaries when finish hatching, if choose not to retain boundaries, then create hatch pattern without boundaries.
